channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 04:49 Air anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 04:49 Air anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk Oblast Watch Further Messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
